address.street: wan chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: the home was very clean, and exactly same in the photo. I love to stay at this area and we would sure stay here again. near to MTR ,7-11, bus station, food station and etc...

Celine is a nice host and really helpful! Since I"m new in Airbnb, Celine reply my questions patiently.  Actually I rent this flat for my parents when they travelling to HK. Cozy and tidy flat. It's a prefect location, easy to access transport. Highly recommended!

Nice apartment, a small but comfortable. The apartment has everything travelers need. Very good location, close to the mtr station and there is a direct bus to the airport. Nearby there are a couple of supermarkets and market, great cafes. There is currency exchange near mtr Wan Chai with an excellent rate. Celine friendly and always promptly respond to questions.

The flat is between Causeway Bay (Time Square) and bar street district. Anyway you will sleep quiet. It is fully equipped with everything you will need during your stay. Next door is one of the most beautiful terrace on 40th floor is located, a bakery with delicious food, 7eleven, pharmacy, etc. nearby
The apartment was quite small, but still enough for two persons. The apartment was clean and in good condition. Wan Chai is very interesting and lively area.
非常温馨的格局,虽然空间很小,但设备具全,就连转换插座和洗浴用品都有,离地铁很近,周围也比较繁华的,闺蜜们都觉得不错,说下次还要来住｡
超舒服的公寓,房间的设备也很完整,Celine也友善,很乐意助人,有什么疑问都很快回复｡四周围也很旺,人流很多, 也很靠近湾仔的地铁站,出入很方便｡

Celine was really accommodating with our early arrival and late departure flights. All appliances & wifi were in good working order and the room was beautifully clean for our arrival. Although the room was small, we were conveniently close to transport links and had everything we needed for our first HK stay.

Thanks!

The location was perfect.  Just a few steps away from Wan Chai station which was just a very short walk to the convention centre :) 
At least we didn't have to get up early for the commute.  In addition, Central and Causeway Bay were also a short walk from Celine's place thus making it so convenient for us to get around. 

The place was small but tidy.  Just enough for the two of us (my husband and I).  We had everything we needed (hot water, wifi, ref, microwave, cooker, tv, washer and a flat iron).  

As a host, Celine was very accommodating.  She made sure we were okay and responded quickly to my messages.  

Thank you, Celine!

The room is small but cozy.. just nice for a couple and a baby.. the facilities  available made the trip easier as I can wash some clothes while went out for sight seing.. will stay there again for my next trip..

Positive experience. Host is accommodating, responsive and helpful. Room is located at a convenient place (just mins away to causeway bay and admiralty/central area). Small room but cozy. Good amenities in the house include the washer and dryer. Suitable for short stay
Celine was a great host because she really cares about the guests staying at her place. She tries to fix everything that may not be comfortable for the guests. Thank you Celine!
good location,just walking distance to Wan chai, clean and cozy .

The studio is a nice and clean place for a short stay. It is small, but it has everything I need. The WIFI is fast, love it. The location is very convenient, lots of eateries, supermarkets nearby. The Airport bus station is just in front of the apartment. Celine is a good host,  I booked this apartment just 2 days prior to the trip, Celine responded very quickly, it made very thing so smooth for me. I enjoy the stay.

This place is comfy for two. A cosy setting with great basic necessities like TV, couch and a table. Cooking is also made possible with some utensils and a fridge. Walking distance to the MRT is also a plus.

The home looks recently renovated. A lot of thought has been put into making sure you have everything during your visit: hangars, soap, hair dryer, iron. Whatever you need can probably be found at the nearby Circle K or 7-Eleven. If traveling alone, I would stay here again.

The studio is a bit smaller than I expected, but tidy and clean. All basic necessities can be find here, especially the washer, it's so useful! Also, the location of the studio is a great plus for it has easy access to MTR, restaurants, shopping area or scenic spots. I enjoy the stay. Thanks Celine!

Celine's apartment is very clean, tidy and well equipped with all the necessities you need. The apartment is also well located, easy access to other parts of HK, there is 7-11 convenient store downstairs, supermarket across the street. Higly recommended.

I have stayed in other Airbnb listings in Hong Kong, and this was perfect for my needs. The room is cozy and comfortable, and very conveniently located near the subway. I had no trouble operating the appliances in the room (though I did have to remind myself to flip the switch and turn on the hot water for the shower -- it's a Hong Kong thing).

Celine was very responsive and accommodating. I had no trouble and hope to stay here again.
Had a lovely stay! Place was clean and very conveniently located. Thanks Celine.

The apartment is clean and well located, both the check-in and check-out process went very smoothly. It's very convenient with public transport and it makes for a good base for exploring city.

Thank you for a comfortable stay!
The host canceled this reservation 67 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very convenient and well equipped place.
物有所值 位置便利 並且是非常舒適的住所 距離MTR銅鑼灣､灣仔站都是中等距離 而且步行到銅鑼灣商圈和最in的日街､月街以及藍屋等地都是很適中的距離 適合港島深度遊的駐足之地

Also it´s in a few steps from the small hill of Montjuïc, where you can visit Poble Espanyol, Joan Miró Foundation Museum and MNAC   Catalunya´s most important museum, or just explore parks and gardens you have around the hill. Also you can walk to Plaça Espanya it will take you 10 min. to enjoy Magic Fountain show in the night. host.host_about:
Hi I'm Alejandro, architect and pasionate apartment owner and manager. I work with my team to offer the best experiences in Barcelona and Pontevedra.
Under Archsense Apartments and ArchSense Barcelona brands, we are a young and dynamic company that is dedicated to personalized management of tourist apartments and houses in two diferent areas in Spain. In Barcelona  (Catalunya) and Pontevedra (Galicia).

Our management comprises different phases, from the initial search of clients, reception and accommodation in the apartment until his departure. We also take care of the apartment all clean and conditioning time, and to resolve any issues that may arise during a guest's stay.
The main goal of our management is twofold:

- Provide the owner a full service under which you can forget about the worries and concerns the operation of holiday rental, knowing that the investment in the business will bring greater benefits than the option of "traditional" rent.
- Get the highest customer satisfaction, ensuring their comfort, in order to make your stay in our apartments result in all the most pleasant time possible.

Our differences with other organizations dedicated to the tourist apartment sector lies in providing special pampering to the customer, feeling to be at their own home and have at all the time a "friend" of reference in the city. This person (me or some of my collaborators) speaks your language, and will help you to solve any questions or problems and looking for suggestions of leisure in the city. 
All this expertise  has allowed us to grow gradually, as the viral marketing has proven to be our best advertising tool, and thus many customers and many others have repeated recommend us to their family and friends. As an architect, different owners have also recommended us to their friends to transform their properties for holiday apartments.

name: Green Flash Guest House / Ohana
summary: Comfortable studio located between Mauna Kea & Kohala mountains on the Sunny side of Waimea (Kamuela), Hawai'i.  10 miles to Hapuna and other beautiful world renown beaches, 1-2 miles to countless great dining and shopping in downtown Waimea, 3 miles to NHCH.   It is a quiet neighborhood (around the corner from HPA campus) with easy access to multiple facets/climates of this Island.  Active health oriented community.  Ideal for independent travelers. a single or couple on vacation or business.
space: The space includes a comfortable double bed, with full bath & well-equipped kitchenette allows you to eat in if you wish. There are dishes, pots, pans, eating and cooking utensils, a ¾ sized refrigerator with separate freezer, one burner butane cooktop, microwave oven, coffee grinder & rice cooker.  Access to gas grill. Free Wifi. Small continental breakfast provided for morning after arrival.   If you have special dietary needs, please inform me when booking.   Several good farmer's markets are available through the week:  Wed 9-2pm, food stalls, jewelry, fruits & vegetables, baked & sweet delights; Sat 7-1, three separate markets, complete with food stalls, fruits & vegetables, plants, florals, island cheese, gelato, and an herbalist.  A good health food store & supermarkets are easily accessible.  Our island is large, for your convenience, most travelers rent a car.  Airport auto rentals are easiest, better rates usually offered a few weeks prior to arrival.  A GPS is helpful especi

neighborhood_overview: This is a beautiful quiet neighborhood.  A perfect choice for those who like serene setting yet close to places & activities.
notes: Please ask about what interests you and I’ll be glad to help you make connections.  You may like to check (Website hidden by Airbnb) to update on current island events, a lovely site with good information.
transit: Public transportation is sketchy at best, not reliable.  Schedule facilitates hotel workers and local folks.  Adventurous travelers can check HeleOn bus online for schedule.  Recommend you rent a car to most enjoy your time.
access: Guests have a separate access to their rental Ohana.
interaction: There are roadmaps, restaurant suggestions, lists of farmer's markets, books of Hawai'ian history available in Ohana.  A basket of beach mats, fins, chairs & other ocean assists available for your use.  I am next door or a text away if there are questions.
house_rules: No Smoking on premises, if you do smoke, please take a walk so smoke doesn't linger about buildings & neighborhood.  Fragrance free except for natural flowers.  No shoes inside house.

host.host_about: Airbnb hostess from Kamuela.  Energy medicine practitioner

reviews.comments: Great Place to stay!!!! Enjoyed my time there, tough to  leave...

Definitely to recommend!!

Thank you very much for everything Jean! We had a fabulous time staying at your house during our Half Ironman weekend.
Great place! Was just what we needed: a comfortable place to stay close to our friends. Cute place with a nice kitchenette and bathroom. Jeanie was a friendly host as a bonus!

The Green Flash Ohana was a delightful place to land for a few days while we explored Waimea, the north Kona beaches, and the Kohala peninsula. Location is perfect for access to these areas. Weather in Waimea is very pleasant, with evening temps cooler than Kona, and clear fresh mountain air. Accommodations were cute, comfortable and clean with a well stocked kitchenette that you could actually cook in, fresh Kona coffee beans in the fridge, and a selection of tea! The Ohana is very nicely decorated, plenty spacious for two, and feels very private. Garden and grounds are beautiful and rustic. Hunt around and you might find a Chameleon or two in the bushes! Jean is a wonderful host, and made us feel like family. Stay here!

My stay at the Green Flash Guest House was truly wonderful.  I had wanted to find a place in Waimea that would give me privacy, lots of light and air, and a feeling of a home vs a hotel.  The Green Flash House met all those wishes and more!  My hostess, Jeanie, also contributed to my positive experience.  Jeanie is warm, friendly, and helpful.  She respected my privacy at all times.  She seemed to have a knack of appearing in her backyard just when I wanted to talk with her but seemed invisible the rest of the time.  She should know I would always welcome the chance to speak to such a rare, spiritual, nice, and entertaining person.

I highly recommend this house for one or two guests.  I do not recommend this place if you have children.  It has too many delicate breakable items on bottom shelves where little hands can reach.

Kim
Central Coast of California
guest for 2 weeks in March 2013

Jean's Suite was clean and comfortable. It's bright and breezy and perfect for exploring Kohala. A short drive from restaurants and about 15 minutes from the famous Hapuna Beach. Jean was a great host, she let us borrow some beach chairs and is very knowledgeable about the area. Had a great time and hope to stay here again next trip.

What a lovely place! Exactly what we expected. Comfortable bed, beach toys, location, location, location and very clean. We had a relaxing time exploring, beaching and eating fabulous food at the Sea Food Bar down the road. Jeanie's place is a great base camp. Thank you for sharing Jeanie!

Jean's Ohana was a joy to call home while in Waimea. It was the perfect size with everything you need and more. Very quiet with a peaceful garden outside. Lots of light and privacy. Would definitely recommend and stay there again. Jean was a great host. Mahalo!

Jeanie's place was our favorite of all the places we stayed during our 18 day visit so we ended up going back staying there the last few nights after traveling the whole island. Super comfy bed and very cute Ohana that's equipped and furnished with everything you'd need. Absolutely recommend- Jeanie is a great host!

We fully enjoyed our stay with Jean. She is a great host with many good ideas and guidelines about some of the attractions on the big Island. It is a nice home style stay with a great country feel. Centrally located on the north of the island, You can go from sea to sky within a short drive. We would recommend it to others.
Brenda & Lloyd Gibson
Clean and comfortable. Central location to explore the North end of the island.  We enjoyed our stay!
We enjoyed our stay at Green Flash house for a few nights and it was comfortable, modern, and peaceful spot to explore Kohala coast and Waimea from. Jean was a great host and very nice.
Our stay was very pleasant. Very functional and private apartment with all amenities, centrally located in beautiful and cool Waimea. Jeanie is a wonderful host! We will be back!

Jean is really friendly, fun and down to earth. Her space is beautiful and has a great view of Mauna Kea on a clear day! Convenient location, only 15 minutes to the North Kohala beaches and about 25 minutes to Hawi, depending on how much you want to stop and take in the views. We slept 3 in the space which works if you're all comfortable with each other. Would definitely go back again!

We enjoyed an excellent stay at the Green Flash Guest House.  The accommodations had everything we needed and was peaceful.  Our host made us feel at home.  We are planning a trip back next year and hope to be able to stay again.

jeane is an angel...she was not just a friendly host but she helped me to rent a car and having a sim card , gave me lots of good recommendations.
i´ll keep big island as a paradise on earth in my mind.

Sono stata 8 notti in questa accogliente casa, la posizione è ottima anche come punto di partenza per visitare l'isola, Jean è una persona squisita e sempre disponibile per qualsiasi consiglio ed esigenza

Jean has created a very nice place with a perfectly equipped kitchenette. I immediately felt welcome there. She also provided some fresh fruit and water and was very kind and supportive with questions I had. I loved my stay there. Thank you very much, Jean!

The ohana was a cozy Waimea getaway. Perfect for an adventurous traveling couple. Although attached to the main house, there is plenty of privacy. There is a humble "kitchen" with and single gas camping burner and plenty of cooking supplies --even a coffee grinder, French presses and Kona coffee stocked and on hand. 

Make sure you solidify check in and out times with the host before you book. She's a one woman show running the airbnb and providing a lovely experience all by herself.

Jeans house is a really nice place to stay. It is clean, very well equipped and we felt very comfortable. Jean is a wonderful host! She provided fresh fruits, bread and coffee beans. it was a pleasure meeting her and we would come back definitely.

The Guest house was lovely and pictures were accurate.  I was arriving at night and Jean was not there as she had a previous engagement, but she gave very clear directions making it easy to find.  The place was very clean and a wonderful bowl of fruit there to great me. Jean was very helpful in providing directions when I requested them.  The Guest House is located near Waimea town and handy to go in for the Farmer's market..which I highly recommend.  Wonderful stay!

Our stay at Jeanie's was fantastic.  She made us feel very welcome from the start and her apartment is superb.  Everything and more than we expected was provided.  The location is excellent for exploring the north part of the island.

Everything was exactly as described except better.  The bed was the most comfortable ever, and the water pressure in the shower was perfect. The whole ohana was spic and span. There was complete privacy. The whole place was a bit magical and there were rainbows everywhere I looked, just exactly like in the photo. The kitchenette was thoughtfully stocked and more than adequate for simple meals, breakfast and snacks. The host couldn't be more thoughtful but at the same time a busy person with her own life.The separate entry offers a comfortable autonomy so that you could come and go without feeling you were disturbing anybody.

I had a fantastic stay at Jean's lovely house in Weimea. The studio had everything in it what I needed. Weimea is the perfect place to stay, high up in the mountains, however, you are on the beach in 15 minutes. Jean is a very lovely host. Thank you for everything!!

We enjoyed our stay at Green Flash Guest House.  Jeanie has created a very welcoming space, and is an extremely personable host!  She provides very comfortable linens, beach towels, and seating indoors and out.  She also thoughtfully offers quality coffee beans (delicious!) and an assortment of local fruits and specialty products (honey, bread, etc.).  The Guest House is on a rather busy road, but is very private.  It is an ideal place to base yourself for exploring the highlights of North and South Kohala.
This was our 2nd stay at the Green Flash Guest House.  It's perfect for our needs in Waimea.  The property is beautiful and Jean is the perfect host!

Ich bin offen und freundlich von Jeanie empfangenen worden und sie hat mir alles gezeigt und erklärt. Ich war überrascht mit wie viel Liebe zum Detail alles eingerichtet war. Die Küche war/ist bestens ausgestattet und ich als Kaffeetrinkerin   habe mich sehr über den Kaffee im Kühlschrank gefreut. Es entsprach alles den Ankündigungen, es war eher noch besser. Vielen Dank Jeanie, dass ich Dein Gast sein durfte und für das Vertrauen, dass Du mir entgegengebracht hast. Ich habe mich richtig wohlgefühlt bei Dir.
Mahalo nui loa
Aloha Beate

Jean was a wonderful hostess- she was so thoughtful and welcoming. The unit was well-stocked and had everything we needed. Jean was also able to provide helpful advice about area restaurants and activities.

We truly loved this vacation and are looking to return.

Jeanie is a lovely host! Warm Aloha welcome and she helped acquaint me with the area. The flash guess house is comfortable cozy space. It has all the basics for feeling at home and is tucked back so you have privacy from the rest of town.  The location is just a couple miles from downtown Waimea and sets on the side of town closer to the beach.

When staying at Jeans one can expect the following:  a yummy little assortment of food upon arrival, beautiful energy when opening your front door, charming pictures on the walls, a comfortable bed, a view of a garden, lovely light coming in the windows, and most likely the faint sound of laughter coming from Jean and one of her lovely friends.   We so enjoyed our time at Jeans, and appreciated that she hosts and runs her air bnb truly with love.  Enjoy the hammock on a warm afternoon, and treat her place with love and care, for that is what she gives to you.  All the best to you Jean, and maybe see you soon!  
Laura, Valentin and Esca

Jean and her home are lovely. She made us feel exceedingly welcome and we're pleased we selected her property. We had a wonderful time in Waimea, will recommend Jean's ohana to our friends, and hope to return soon.

We loved staying at the Green Flash Guest House! Jeanie is a gem. She was very accommodating and responsive. The space is nice and cozy and is exactly as it is described in the profile.  The kitchenette is perfectly stocked and we were even welcomed with some delicious fruits, locally baked bread, and coffee! Jeanie was extremely helpful with navigating the Big Island and gave us a lot of great recommendations during our stay. It's a short drive to amazing snorkeling spots. There is a great drive you can take north through the mountains above Waimea also. The rainbow in the profile pic is real by the way--we saw rainbows everyday. Just perfect. If we make it back to the big island, we'll stay at the Green Flash again. Thanks Jeanie!

Jeanie was a great host! The in-law apartment was just as described and pictured. It was very clean and comfortable, and overlooks the garden. Jeanie even left us fruit, bread and coffee so we were all set for the next morning despite our later arrival. Definitely looking forward to visiting again!

This place was one of the best Air BnBs in which we have ever stayed. Waimea is a great location for exploring the northern parts of the big island and a wonderful little town. Jean is absolutely lovely. She obviously takes great care of her home and the guest house, and she made us feel like friends more than renters with her many good suggestions, produce gifts, and kind words. The guest house is extremely clean and airy. Substantial kitchen as these guest houses go. We would recommend this place to anyone!
Jean was great! Helpful and sweet. Place was cute, clean and had everything I needed. A bit of noise in the morning being near a road but nothing terrible. Location was nice too.

Alex and I spent 2 weeks at the Green Flash Guest House in Waimea for Christmas this year and it was our favourite visit to the Big Island so far... Jean was a superb host; very approachable and friendly and made us feel welcome at all times and ensured our needs were met continually. Jean had fresh fruit, bread and water for the first morning (as we arrived quite late the previous night), fresh sheets and towels at our disposal (bathroom, kitchen and beach) in the guest house which is very comfortable and allowed us the opportunity to eat in or eat out. The Green Flash Guest House is in the perfect location to some of our favourite spots as it is very central and accessible to all of the main highways on the Island. The ambience at and around the Guest House is relaxing and invigorating and promotes rest and relaxation...thank you Jean!!!

Green Flash is the best! Everything we needed to have a fun, adventurous time in Hawaii. Plenty of gear, a perfect location near beaches, town, shopping and restaurants. Though we spent most of our time out and about, we always felt like we were coming home each evening. Jean is an amazing lady. She is helpful with ideas and owies alike and always made us feel welcome. The small cozy Ohana was comfortable and clean, and the garden yard was beautiful. A little traffic noise but otherwise a lovely, safe neighborhood with lots of nice people.

The Green Flash O'hana was perfect. Great launching pad for trips to the beach and anything in Waimea or down east/west. It's got a sweet little kitchen that really works well. And we loved all the Japanese art work. There was a lot of thoughtfulness that went into this O'hana. Jeanie was a really wonderful host and great at communicating with us. It was just a really comfortable studio. We will definitely return. Genie also welcome to us with a delicious loaf of sourdough bread,  coffee beans and a big basket of fruit. Can't wait to return.

My son and I arrived and were warmly greeted by Jean.  She was such a kind and knowledgable host, we instantly felt at home and were very comfortable.  We had everything we needed in the well stocked kitchen and lovely bathroom. 
 The bed was so comfortable and was perfect after a long day working to sleep, relax and watch some TV.  The location was perfect being close to shopping in Waimea Town and very close to some beautiful beaches.  I highly recommend!

Nice place. Connected to main house but felt very private and comfortable. Had a well stocked usable kitchen which was great. Road noise can be a little loud in the mornings but fine if the windows are closed. Bed is a full which was a bit small for us (husband is very tall) but otherwise was comfortable.

Jean’s Place was a lovely comfortable place to stay. Very private and economical. She is very welcoming. The towels were a bit ruff but all in all I would recommend her place to stay if you want to relax after a busy day on Kona. 
Pat

Greenflash Ohana was comfortable, beautiful, and conveniently located to all the things we wanted to do on the island. Jean thoughtfully supplied the small kitchenette with snacks and coffee which we were grateful for after our long flight. The place is simple and cosy, and stocked with all the things you might need to make yourself at home: grocery bags, a mini-library of local history, nature and folklore, and lovely garden views from the little dining table. While the traffic on the road was a bit loud in the mornings, it was worth it for us to be so well located near shops, great restaurants, a quick drive to excellent beaches, and close to my friend's town. Waimea is a great little village.
Jean was communicative and kind. I'd happily stay here again.
We loved our stay at Jean's place. It was very well equipped with everything you can think of to have a comfortable stay. Thanks for sharing your ohana with us!!
Fantastic place. Jeannie was wonderful, giving advice on what to do, and even providing fresh baked bread and local honey and coffee. I'd visit again in a heartbeat.

Sweet space, centrally located with access to so many of the Big Island's treasures. Garden outside has an array of plants, flowers and vegetables with beautiful raised beds. Jean communicated quite quickly each time I needed to connect with her and accommodated me w some special requests needed for my stay. Lovely & warm host!
Great spot! Central to lots of different activities. Jeanie is great and gives lots of suggestions. We loved it!
Jean’s place is spacious, clean and convenient and she’s a terrific host. We definitely recommend it!

Jean's place is neat! I was pleasantly surprised by the size of the space when I arrived, I was expecting it to be smaller. Bed was very comfy for one person, not sure it would be for two people though. There are thoughtful touches, and also lots of brochures and books about the island. The road is closer to the house than I thought, so you can hear the traffic, but hey it's Hawaii... so it's not bad, and it's quiet at night.
I liked to be in Waimea, I think it's well situated if like me you like to drive around a lot (I did all the main roads of the island in one week, it was awesome). It's the country and it's beautiful! And there are gorgeous beaches only a short 30 minutes drive away. The town has a few great places to eat (great ramen at noodle club).
Jean was very prompt to respond to messages and is super friendly!! Mahalo!!

name: Manly Harbour View
summary: Set High on eastern Hill Manly enjoy unobstructed views of Sydney Harbour.
space: Quiet location
description: Set High on eastern Hill Manly enjoy unobstructed views of Sydney Harbour. Quiet location Guest have full use of the large living / dining room and balcony over looking Sydney Harbour, kitchen also enjoys same view . 3 bedrooms internal laundry. Pool is also included. contactable The apartment is only a few hundred metres from the manly skiff club and the Manly wharf bar is also in walking distance. Lots of restaurants are also close by . Walking and bike riding is highly recommended, however the community does provide local hop on hop off buses . Manly is a popular tourist area , it has an abundance of restaurants, bars and Cafes . Getting around is easy either by foot or my favourite is pedal power . I’m happy to provide a few bikes .

name: mountain pied-a-terre in the heart of Hong Kong
summary: A beautiful mountain getaway in the heart of Hong Kong Island with easy taxi and minibus access to Airport Express, Central, Admiralty and Wan Chai as well as hiking trails and pedestrian-friendly walks in all directions.  The famous Hong Kong skyline and view from Victoria Peak is a scenic 20 minute stroll from your front door -- choose your path.  This pied-à-terre apartment has its own private stairs and gated entrance. A spacious balcony with green and city views runs the length.
space: This is a unique mountain hideaway - perfect for nature-loving guests looking to explore Hong Kong as well as frequent visitors seeking a special experience, or even Hong Kongers considering a local weekend getaway. Private entrance to apartment: Ship-shape bedroom with extensive closet space and dresser table. Separate reading room with desk and closets which can  be converted into a separate sleeping area with a floor futon. Full well-appointed bathroom with shower amenities. Ample hallway space and access to washer/dryer facilities. Private outdoor balcony terrace with chairs and potted plants.

Closed to Bağdat avenue 5 minutes, bus and metro stops to the city center 2 minutes and 5 minutes boat pier Prince Islands and 2 minutes to Cozzy Mall. The entire flat is  cosy, modern and minimal decoration. Outdoor and indoor parking. The whole flat is equipped for your comfort, and I will be glad be your host during your stay in İstanbul. There are all kinds of things you need when you stay in the house.
space: The living room inculudes a comfy sofa, dinner table, armchairs,  3D LED tv(connected to the internet), dvd player, air conditioning and nice view. The well-equipped kitchenette comes with an oven, dishwasher, two kind of toaster, an electric kettle and turkish coffee machine, juice extractor, filter coffee machine, a fridge with freezer are provided.

reviews.comments: Çok güzel bir ev, herşey yeni. Mutfak ve banyo pırıl pırıl, mutfaktaki tabaklar ve banyodaki havlular daha önce hiç kullanılmamışçasına yeni. Çarşaflar ve yastık kılıfları, havlular ütülenmiş olarak yerlerine konulmuştu. Giysi dolanıbının çekmecesindeki lavanta koku torbasına kadar her şey en ince ayrıntısına kadar düşünülmüştü. Ev sahibimiz mutfak ve salona taze nergis çiçekleri koyarak evin kokusunun bile doğal güzellikte olmasına özen göstermişti. Evdeki canlı çiçekleri ve duvarda asılı orijinal olduğunu tahmin ettiğim tabloları çok sevdim. Bir de kahve makinelerini. Türk kahvesi için ve filtre kahve için ayrı ayrı kahve makineleri vardı. Yemek masası ve kanepe çok kullanışlı idi. Evdeki herşey İkea'dan alınmış ve özenle seçilmişti. Çok rahat ve kullanışlı, kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

reviews.comments: 房子就在铜锣湾地铁站上盖,路程大概一分钟,非常好找｡附近全部都是餐厅 ,24 小时超市和商店,离开sogo 也是一分钟的事｡房东回覆非常快,基本上秒回,令我们觉得非常安心｡房子很干净漂亮,感觉像家一样｡床非常舒服,应该是很贵质量的床,能感觉到房东的诚意｡床单很香｡大厦有电梯跟24 小时保安,住的很安心｡离开机场45 分钟,可以地铁跟大巴直接到｡以后来香港还是要再住｡

Very pleasant stAy , our family stayed there for two weeks and enjoyed it a lot . Bella response was so quick and made everything very smooth . Check in was very easy . The building has 24 hours security guard making it feel so safe.  The lobby is new and bright . There are also double fire proof door at the staircase .  The beds are comfortable and clean , and the apartment is much more spacious than the other airbnb we stayed in hk before . We will definitely only book this place in the future . The design of the apartment is very nice and chic , with new toilet tiles, new toilets and everything is new . We feel privileged to stay there as it's in such a new state . Below the apartment are all major transportation. Very easy to travel everywhere . It is highly recommended .
房子就在铜锣湾地铁站上盖,房东提供了入住资料图片带路非常好找｡去哪里都非常便利容易｡房子十分干净｡床铺都是换过的住的很安心｡楼下24 小时保安大堂明亮,房东回覆十分快｡床很舒服宽阔,洗澡的热水也很好｡一切都跟图片一样,唯一就是没想过这么好｡绝对值得这个价钱｡非常推荐想来香港玩的小伙伴
位置超级方便,床相对香港的大多数民宿来说要大很多,这个价格这个位置,已经很不错了｡
Great location. Easy to get around everywhere. Would love to stay there again!
交通便利,周边食铺林立
位置很好找到,空间大足够六个人休息｡房主回复迅速,解决问题也很及时
住处的位置离港铁站真的不远,只要分清方向很容易找到,入住也不难,楼下也有保安管理,整体整洁干净

首先是交通便利,出了铜锣湾地铁很好找,导航有点坑,最好直接问路人或者阿sir,可以节省找路的时间;接着是生活便利,楼下有九龙冰室､米线店､茶餐厅､超市､银行取款机,街口还有港式小吃,翠华离的也不远;然后是房间环境,大厦很安全,出入全靠钥匙,每年都要来港,这次选择民宿是想着人多比酒店划算,没想到很惊喜,房内物品基本都是来自宜家,住过香港不少酒店,民宿的空间比住过的酒店都大,如果以后人多再去,依然会选择这里
位置很好找,交通很便利,房东很耐心,取门卡过程很有趣｡厕所门是折叠门,且有点坏,不太方便;房间推拉门,老是改变轨道,孩子很喜欢,生怕弄坏;孩子抱怨没有电视,不太好;网络没找到,想着自己开通无限流量够用就没有咨询房东了,只是委屈家中其他人｡
地理位置很好找,购物也很方便,性价比还可以

neighborhood_overview: Bairro seguro. Ao mesmo tempo que é agitado por conta dos bares, restaurantes e etc, é super tranquilo e residencial. Agrada todo tipo de publico.
transit: O acesso ao metrô Botafogo pode ser feito a pé (7 minutos de caminhada). Também é rápido e fácil caminhar até supermercados, farmácias, shopping (Botafogo praia Shopping), praia de Botafogo, restaurantes e bares  Metrô/carro/ ônibus: - Copacabana (uma estação de metrô/ 10 minutos de carro ou ônibus) - Ipanema, Leblon e Barra : metrô é o meio mais barato e rápido. Ônibus também pode ser uma opção. - Flamengo, Aterro do Flamengo, Largo do Machado e Laranjeiras e centro: fácil acesso tanto de metrô quanto de ônibus. -Urca/Pão de Açucar : super próximo. Apesar de não existir metrô, existe mais de uma linha de ônibus que pode te deixar lá. Ir com aplicativos de taxi também vale a pena e sai baratinho. Aeroporto SDU: A opção mais segura é pegar um carro por aplicativo. Em média 15 min de viagem (8km). Aeroporto Galeão: 30/40 min - 22km de distância. Você pode optar pelos taxis credenciados do aeroporto ou pedir um carro de aplicativo.  Rodoviária Novo Rio: existem duas opções: 1) pegar metrô

name: Beautiful house with terrace & Wifi
summary: This house, located in Alfena, is ideal for 6 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished terrace and WiFi.
space: This house, located in Alfena, is ideal for 6 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished terrace and WiFi.  The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi, a DVD player, a radio, video games and a CD player.  The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 6 or outside, on the terrace enjoying views of the city.  The house has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 2 including a double bed.  The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.  The house features  a vacuum cleaner, ironing equipment, a washing machine, air conditionning and a fan.  Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee. Parking is available onsite. Smoking is allowed. Pets are allowed on demand. Parties are not allowed. The owner lives near the property.

transit: ❤位於香港中心地帶,尖沙咀區 步行距離 ❤1分鐘到尖沙咀大型購物商場(The One/美麗華廣場/K11等) ❤2分鐘到尖沙咀地鐵站B2出口 ❤4分鐘到尖沙咀酒吧街—諾士佛臺 ❤10分鐘到尖沙咀鐘樓/星光大道/維多利亞港欣賞夜景 ❤12分鐘到海港城/中港城等名牌集中地 ❤15分鐘到廟街市集 乘地鐵 ❤5分鐘到旺角/女人街 ❤7分鐘到中環/SOHO區/蘭桂芳 ❤10分鐘到銅鑼灣/時代廣場 ❤15分鐘到海洋公園/太平山纜車站 ❤18分鐘到黃大仙廟 ❤40分鐘到香港迪士尼樂園/昂坪360纜車站 到機場/各個關口 ❤18分鐘到西九龍高鐵站(地鐵+步行) ❤45分鐘到機場(機場快線) ❤55分鐘到羅湖口岸/落馬洲口岸(地鐵+火車)
access: ❤ 請享受我們清新自然的公寓, 整個公寓都是屬於你的!  ❤ 您有完整的隱私,設有私人浴室 / 衛生間｡你不需要與任何陌生人分享｡  ❤ 請攜帶自己的毛巾,牙刷和牙膏,以保持環保 ;)
interaction: ❤ 在您入住之前,您將收到有關入住手續的詳細說明｡如有任何疑慮,我們隨時可以通過電子郵件 / (Hidden by Airbnb) / We-Chat / Airbnb聊天｡  ❤ 在緊急情況下,您可以打電話給我｡ ❤ 我們非常樂意為您提供有關參觀地點和當地餐館的建議｡  ❤ 我們希望我們的客人能把這裡感覺像家一樣｡對我們來說,給予我們正面或負面評價可以讓我們變得更好｡我們會盡最大能力幫助你 =)

address.street: 尖沙咀, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 作为天空之城的第一位房客真的很幸运,酒店跟房东描述的一样,位置超棒,坐地铁逛商场吃美食都很方便,希望房东越做越好,下次来香港的话还会住在这里的!
It was a very convenient place to stay. There are a lot of food around.
很好的房子啊 也很有感觉要是想要shopping 这家准没错 楼下就有金英药妆还有甜蜜蜜啊 离地铁站也很近 地铁站对面就有翠华餐厅.到达海港城也就10分钟
房间面积比想象中小很多,整个房间转一圈只需要七步,没有桌子没有椅子,卫生间小到无法伸手｡交通位置方便是唯一可取之处｡
地理位置不错
房东相当的热心贴心,回复也很及时｡房子整体比预期要好,勉强可以住三个人,性价比较高｡地理位置特别棒,几步路就有地铁站,十分钟走到维港,二十分钟能走到游船码头坐船去澳门｡美中不足在于床铺不是太干净,第一次也比较难找｡
Value for money
民宿地理位置非常好,走路十多分钟到海港城,崇光百货,离地铁口个非常近!附近各种小吃都有!简直不要太方便!

name: Center of Kadikoy, Moda
summary: My dear flat with 2 rooms + living room in center of Mehmet Ayvalitas Square in Kadıköy, Moda. The house is at the starting point of Bahariye Street. Relax your feet at my 120mt2 garden on the soil after a lovely day in Istanbul. There is no cafes and bars crowded, you can wake up with bird singing in the morning. You can walk to cafes, bars around 3-4 mins. Tram stop is 20-30 seconds to walk..
space: Flat is in center of center. Your flat view is not on road, cars or crowded etc. You have garden view! My dear house has an individual 120 m2 of garden with full of trees and green habitat, and my plants! You have to taste beautiful black mulberries. (If you're right time for season-june july) There is a wooden table with 4 chairs on garden where you can smell fresh air while tasting our traditional Turkish tea to relax.

neighborhood_overview: Moda is very old place actually, but in last years very popular place. Many local people live here, when you come in here you ll see the many old people, cats and hipsters. So we live peaceful here. Hope you love (:
notes: There is only 1 thing for me. No party here, and no loud music. This is very important for me.  Flat is extremely hot (center heater), but there is no hot water on kitchen tap.  Super fast internet we have (85mbit)  And i use half 1/2 fabric softener. If you have any allergic reaction. please let me know before your stay.
transit: Flat is center of center, so you have tram, metrobus, minibus, ferry and etc.  Metrobus is 14 min to walk. Minibus 45 seconds to walk. Tram stop 30 sec. to walk. Ferry is 13 min to walk.

host.host_about: I am 27 years old and I live a best and happiest time of my life like there ain't no before 27 age. To spend time in my garden helps me to relieve tiredness and stress of business. I am interested in flowers and a variety plants. I've shooted a photograph since 2007, some of them had been a book's cover, or invited to exhibit and published in various places. I am Cinematographer (DoP), shooting Tv commercials, contribution of the photo takes huge place in my life. I like to read Murakami and folk tales of China.

My family and I spend four great nights at Felipe's place. What's best about this apartment: the view and the perfect location in the heart of Ipanema, close to Lagoa, the beach and lots of good restaurants and stores. Felipe was also very nice to us, providing us with the essential information about the apartment and the neighborhood.
Amazing place, great location close to all Ipanema attractions and also located in a very quiet neighborhood, terrace is great and  appt is cosy.

La casa es realmente preciosa, muy acogedora, muy bien equipada. Nos sentimos como en casa. La ubicación es la más linda de ipanema y pudimos ir todos los días a la playa que está a apenas unas cuadras. Es muy tranquilo y silencioso pese a estar a metros de la zona más movida de ipanema. La recomendamos sin dudarlo.

Felipe es un gran host! Nos ayudo en todo lo que necesitábamos. El departamento es increíble en la mejor zona! Lo recomiendo sin dudas!
Gracias por todo!
Apartment is as described and Felipe was a great host. The apartment is very nice and in a great location. The view from the balcony is outstanding. We definitely would stay at the place again.

El departamento es excelente. 
Ubicación: excelente! 4 cuadras de la playa (posto 9), en una de las mejores zonas de Rio, restaurantes, bares, cerca de un montón de medios de transportes (entre ellas el metro), segura.

Departamento: cuenta con 2 dormitorios y 2 baños, mas el comedor y lo mejor, una terraza amplia con vista al cristo. Esta bien decorado y bien equipado (con todos los electrodomésticos necesarios, hasta una cafetera nespresso!). Se nota que es nuevo. Eso si, los ambientes no son grandes, pero para nosotros eso no es un problema.

Host: Felipe se portó muy bien con nosotros, fue flexible con nuestro horario de ingreso y salida. Nos dio todas las recomendaciones necesarias y nos dejó su teléfono para que lo consultemos por cualquier cosa.

Seguramente si vuelva a Rio trate de volver a este departamento.
We had a wonderful time in Filipe's lovely apartment.  It really had everything you would require for a holiday stay and was in a great location.  Pick up service was good too.

Felipe was great, at disposal and very nice. The apartment is in a great location, beautiful terrace, everything needed for a perfect holidays was supplied and everything is clean and functional. 

Strongly recommend to stay here!!!
Alessandro

Felipe é um ótimo anfitrião, muito amigável e solícito.
 Adoramos o apartamento, muito bem localizado e aconchegante. 
Em breve estaremos de volta!
All was great

I really enjoyed my stay at Felipe’s place.  
The apartment is really cool, like a house on top of the building. 
Really nice terrace and amazing view. 

Felipe was really reactive to facilitate our stay.

Fantastic place! Nicely decorated, all necessary amenities and some extras like coffee-machine (Nespresso), BBQ grill, perfect working silent A/C in the living room, marvelous powerful showers. Only thing missing that is always a bonus is a dishwasher which I believe would be impossible to fit due to the compact size of the Kitchen.
Location is perfect with plenty of restaurants and bars at short walking distance. However, the building is next to a school which understandably was a little loud at times but nothing to be concerned about or to be of any impact to diminish the quality of the apartment.
Host is easy to talk to, friendly and made sure to reply all our questions (even the ones before the stay) promptly and very polite.
I would not ONLY stay there again but am ACTUALLY looking forward to the next opportunity!
Well located in Ipanema, close to everything. Secure building with a 24/7 guard.

neighborhood_overview: The example, Sagrada Familia zone is one of the most visited areas in Barcelona and you can feel and watch the Gaudi architecture around the area. The area is full of restaurants and cafés with a lot of parks and green hot spots, in the same time the area is very safe is a very exclusive area for living.
transit: I'm right in between two metro stops, Joanic (L4) or Sagrada famila (L5 & L2). I have also a wide selection of public buses around the corner to take you anywhere you want to go. How to get from Barcelona airport to the apartment:  Option 1: T1 & T2, Aerobus - Express bus service to Plaza Universitat change to Metro L2 (purple line) to  Sagrada Familia, the metro stop is equally close to the apartment. You have to walk 300metres. Option 2: Metro L9 from Termina 1 or 2 until Collblant. Then change to L5 (blue) until Sagrada Familia. the metro stop is equally close to the apartment. You have to walk 300metres. Option 3: Train from T2. If you land on T1 you can take the airport shuttle (free of cost) to T2 and take the train from T2 to Clot/Arago. From Clot you can take the metro L2 (purple line) to Sagrada Familia. You have to walk 300metres. This is the most economic way. Option 3: Taxi - Takes about 25-30 minutes

host.host_about:
Outgoing, energetic, philosophic, connected to the spiritual values of life. I enjoy being outdoors snowboarding, hiking, riding a bike or body boarding right before sunset. “I’ve been studying yoga practice, modern dance, and movement for the past ten years with Betty Jones and Fritz Ludin. Also, experience taiko drum with Kenny Endo. I am very passionate about the performing arts!”
I am also a traveler and spent a significant amount of time in Europe, Brazil, Indonesia. March 2016 I traveled to the Himalayas and visited Bhutan and June 2017 I went to Peru.

reviews.comments: It was such a treat to stay with Marcia, and I would love to return! She made me so comfortable and graciously included me in the fun! The house is lovely and the location is great! Obrigada, Marcia!

Marcia is an excellent host and a marvelous fun person. She is very warm and welcoming, and considerate of her guests in many ways. Her house is very clean, and unusually relaxing. The surrounding valley is beautiful and I found my stay to be quite therapeutic.

I loved loved loved my stay with Marcia. I felt immediately at home. The home is as light and bright as it appears in the pics and the room is so wonderful and spacious. The bed is really comfortable and the entire vibe is exactly what you want from a place to stay in Hawaii; relaxing and peaceful. Marcia and her partner whipped up such a lovely welcome feast with local papaya and eggs and then they showed me the way to Diamond Head beach + Costco. I was made to feel very welcome and i'd stay here again in a heartbeat.

My staying at Marcia was in short words:  Wonderful and really warm.
Marcia is an absolutely fantastic Host to stay and the Room for sure too. Located really good. Best way to reach is a car.
thanks Marcia, hope to see you again.
Rainer

Marcia is a perfect host with a very nice appartment. It was a pleasure to share our vacation time in the Marcia's Apartament because it's a very clean, confortable and friendly apartament with a very good relation between quality and price. 

The ubication is enough near to the Honolulu center to enjoy the city and the beaches, and you will not spend so much time to arrive to any place on this paradisiac island.

Marcia's place was perfectly located for my purposes, but be aware there is no great bus service to the beach. However she was kind enough to lend me a bicycle and helmet! The room was lovely, cleanliness and energy conservation are very important to Marcia so if you cannot respect that I recommend a hotel! Wonderful views of many rainbows. It was nice to stay in a real neighborhood away from the tourists.

Marcia is a terrific host for sure! I felt respectful and safe in my staying here. I like to talk with Marcia and also like to listen her experience sharing. That made me feel like I was home. Thank you so much!

Staying in Marcia's home was so lovely that 10 days later I booked in again with my family for another stay. The house itself is clean and has a nice fresh energy about it. Marcia is a fantastic host with many great tips. The location is a 10-15 minute cycle to Waikiki which was perfect as staying right in the mixer can be overwhelming and you may not get to see this side of living on the island. I would be more than happy to stay here again when returning to Oahu. I highly recommend booking in with Marcia!
Room exactly as described. Much appreciated access to the clean, well-appointed, spacious living room and kitchen. Marcia is also a pleasure to deal with!

Very luck for me to choose to stay in Marcia's house, you could have local feel when you not stay in hotel.
She is a very nice people, she give us valuable guidance on places around, and we also had nice talk together.
Thanks to Marcia since she help us fix two parking ticket. 
Highly recommended to stay with her.
I will definately stey with her if I come to Oahu again.
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was a pleasure staying with Marcia! It was a great and comfortable room and the house is lovely, with a great deck and view. It's pretty easy to get to and from Downtown and Waikiki on the bus. I would definitely stay here again!

My stay with Marcia was everything I hoped it would be and more. The accommodations are lovely--exactly as they are portrayed on the Airbnb site. Marcia made me feel welcome from the moment of my arrival. She was kind and accommodating--I truly felt like I'd found a home away from home. Thank you, Marcia, for sharing your home with me!

I booked this as a surprise for my sister. Here is her feedback: Marcia was such a lovely host, I could not have asked for a better one. She greeted me warmly from the moment I arrived and was helpful the entire time I was there, constantly giving me ideas of where to go and what to do. I am so happy I was able to spend my vacation in such a great home! Thanks so much, Marcia!

We could not have found a more beautiful place to stay at than Marcia's during our transition to Oahu as we looked for our own place. We stayed at her place for 18 days and it was a wonderful experience from day one when Marcia greeted us with a warm aloha hug followed by a very detailed tour of her home. She was great to talk with and full of life and wisdom, and also pointed us to a very delicious Greek restaurant (Olive Tree) nearby for dinner. Her home is immaculately clean with a gorgeous kitchen, has a lovely deck where you can see the luscious mountains and Waikiki twinkling in the distance, is loaded with all of the plates, glassware, silverware, cooking equipment, etc. that you'll ever need (even tupperware!), and is located in a really great neighborhood (Kaimuki/Palolo Valley) in short driving distance to lots of amazing restaurants and not too far from Whole Foods and Kahala Mall. Important notes to consider: 1) The sewage pipes in the house are apparently pretty old, so you will be asked to not flush toilet paper down the toilet, but rather place it in the garbage. It takes some getting used to, but eventually you'll get the hang of it! 2) Her home is located on a VERY steep hill and her parking spot is very difficult to maneuver into, so street parking is highly advised. All in all, we had a very lovely stay with Marcia and look forward to staying in touch!

Marcia is an incredibly warm and welcoming woman. And her home reflects these values in all ways. Decorated with beautiful art from world travels, you will feel peaceful and inspired in her rooms. There is a lovely wrap-around lanai to enjoy extraordinary views of Honolulu's diverse city and mountainous landscape. Everything is impeccably clean and spacious. And you will enjoy as much quiet and privacy as you like, as Marcia is respectful and intentional in all things. She also has incredible knowledge of outdoor activities and restaurants to make the most memorable experiences in O'ahu. I would recommend booking Marcia's guest room for a single or a couple in a heartbeat, and I look forward to referring friends and family when they come to visit. I am certain their experience will be as exceptional as mine, and being able to confidently refer someone you trust and enjoy makes all the difference in the time you have.

Accommodation in Marcia's house was a beautiful thing made it, the location is fantastic close to Waikiki Beach, Marcia was a sophisticated, she helped me to find a wonderful places in Honolulu, if I returned to Hawaii I will book again in the same house, thanks Marcia for everything.

Marcia is truly a one of a kind host! She welcomed me into her home with open arms and an open heart. From the moment Marcia greeted me I knew I had booked the perfect place for my stay in Oahu. Marcia's home was exactly as pictured in her profile. I felt very comfortable using the shared spaces as I wished. Marcia graciously answered my questions about the island and provided me with great suggestions about what to see and do. Marcia went above and beyond just being a host, she openly invited me to spend time with her and her friends where I was able to experience Oahu as a local. If you are looking to meet a beautiful soul and stay in a peaceful home with great vibes then Marcia's home is the place for you!

Gostaria de agradecer a anfitriã Márcia, q me recebeu muito bem!!! A sua casa é maravilhosa aconchegante e com todas as coisas necessárias para uma excelente estada. Digo q me senti em casa!!! Destaco algo de suma importância q foi a limpeza e higiene da casa. Está bem localizada e consegui fazer uma viagem TOP, conheci toda a Ilha de Oahu. Obrigado por tudo Márcia!!! Forte Ab Alessandro

I cannot even describe what an amazing time I spent at Marcia house ! I arrived to her place super tired, she welcomed me very warm and nicely. The house is very clean, light, beautiful, artistic, the vibration of amazing and good energy just come coome and coooome and you cannot do nothing with yourself , you just falling in love :) 
Marcia is very interesting, easy going person, flexible. We had few very good conversations, she can give you a lot of good advices what to do in Hawaii, Oahu. Where is better to buy stuff, when and where is better to go, compared to this is nothing if I talk about how amazing Marcia is, how nice she is and from the first minute I was feeling like its my home. I'm very happy that my first experience in Airbnb was with Marcia ! And for me now she is not the "host", she is my good friend and I would love to come back!!!! 
Also it was so nice when she invited me for yoga class, she gave me a ride few times and also helped me with my super heavy bags !!! 
The bed! I don't even remember when I slept so sweet, like a child haha. Very comfortable.  

Thank you so much for everything! I was made to feel very welcomed and I would stay here again and again ! 
Mahalo

Marcia is a lovely host . She is very knowledgeable of the island and how to get around.  The house has a steep approach from the street otherwise it was all that I wanted. Very clean and welcoming. I would stay again.

Place is nice and clean. Marcia is extremely nice and helpful. The neighbours are not the best. It could get very loud and noisy passed midnight on the weekend. Parking is a big challenge if you are not used to parking on a steep hill and you definitely need a 4 wheel drive. However there is parking on the street, which is what we did. And remember as soon as you enter the islands, roosters are everywhere. They make noise around the clock.
Marcia is wonderful! She made my time on Oahu very pleasant and helped me figure out good places to visit. The home is very clean and well furnished.

Marcia was so nice to me. She is friendly and good listener. She helped me a lot in many ways during I was staying there. She is great photographer. 
Her house is clean and everything makes me feel comfort.

Marcia is the best! She is a lovely person, the house was even better than in the pictures, and the location is perfect for exploring Oahu while staying away from the tourist traps. She's a reservoir of knowledge about the island and is warm, kind, and fun to talk to. I highly recommend this booking!

Marcia was warm and welcoming to us.  She talked with us whenever we were all at home hanging out in common areas, and even offered us a ride into town one Friday night! House was great, I personally loved the decor, it created very good and positive vibes for me. The deck was awesome, big and spacious with a great view. Sun shines on it every morning.  The driveway is super steep and gets slippery when wet! That was the only thing I didn't enjoy coming home to haha. The bedroom I stayed in was perfect for us, with a ceiling fan that kept us cool. Kitchen was clean with lots of pots, pans, utensils and Tupperware that she shared with us.
I had a great experience during my stay. I would book with Marcia again. Clean and she was extremely helpful!

the house has wonderful scenario to offer. the beautiful mountain surrounding the accomodation is something the guest would receive extra feature of this accommodation. lots of fresh air from the mountain. the guest can manage to have a view of far places from the house and the balcony. 

other things are satisfactory. cannot complaint about.

Marcia was absolutely lovely. Overall, she was kind, considerate, friendly, and provided great recommendations. Marcia will welcome you into her home and will quickly make you feel comfortable. She has mastered the delicate balancing act of hospitality and respecting your personal privacy. Her home is beautiful, clean, quiet, and in a great location to get to any other parts of the island (she has amazing views of the mountains from her kitchen and living room area as well as a view of Waikiki). Marcia is a photographer who works from home in the lower level of her house. It was not a big deal for me, but Marcia did ask that toilet paper be thrown into a wastebasket rather than flushed down the toilet. Guests have the option of parking up a steep driveway, however, I would recommend parking on the street (there is plenty of street parking available in the neighborhood and I was able to find parking spots close to Marcia’s home during the evening hours). Lastly, I would highly recommend eating at Sprout Sandwich Shop and Town Restaurant.

We found Marcia's Appartement exactly as it was described: Perfect location in a quiet neighborhood (~10 min drive to Waikiki/Honolulu), nice lanai with incredible view on mountains and Honolulu, everything was clean and tidy! Marcia gave us helpful recommendations for what to do and where to go and we enjoyed living with her. It was always a relaxed atmosphere. We parked our car on street and had no issues finding a spot close to the apartment. 

We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this place for anyone visiting O'ahu! Thank you Marcia!!

Marcia's place is very quiet! This is what drew me to her place.  Waikiki is very close and there are so many places to eat nearby that you might not even want to eat downtown where the prices are more expensive.  She waives her cleaning fee because she requires guests to clean up after using the kitchen, bathroom, and throwing toilet paper in the trash and not the toilet, but it is a small demand to ask for since most people should be cleaning up after themselves (perhaps not the toilet paper thing).  Marcia has lots of knowledge of the local area and directed me to some wonderful areas I may have skipped. I would stay with her again!

Marcia has a great space that she loves to share with guests from all over the world who come to Oahu. It's very clean and she provides a full kitchen and shared space with everything you may need.  The location is great with restaurants in walking distance and beaches nearby like Diamond Head and Waikiki.  She's a wonderful cook so if she happens to invite you to share a meal--say yes! Thanks again for everything Marcia, I will be back again soon!
Marcia is a wonderful and energetic person, I enjoyed staying at her place very much!!! Looking forward to meet her again someday.

It is really a nice cozy and tidy room with all the facilities .I arrived at Marcia's house at night ,and she still waited for me to help me know everthing about the (Website hidden by Airbnb) even helped me to stop being towed because of my careless parking  .She is a kind-hearted and generous host with hospitality.She told me all the sugesstion I can get about Oahu.It must be a nice choice for you to live in Marcia's house .

Marcia’s house was just astounding. It was in a perfect and very safe location. So very modern and clean. She offered me a delicious dinner as soon as I arrived. The aspect that really made my stay in Hawaii was Marcia. She was so thoughtful, humble, interesting, full of kindness, and was there if I needed anything. I will surely be back. I am so glad to have spent the time that I did talking with her! Stay at her house. Period. You will love it, just as I did.
Nice stay at Marcia’s place. The location was close to Waikiki area as described. Host was super welcoming and helped make my time worth while with must see/do places. Definitely worth the stay.
It’s a very nice and quiet place to stay in Hawaii. I like the mountains around . Everything is just so clean. If you are looking for a B&B in this area, just go to Marcia’s place!
You will enjoy your stay here. The location is very scenic.

I really enjoyed my stay at Marcia's place. The photos are an accurate representation of the rooms and overall living environment. I especially loved the bathtub because it was updated, clean, and modern. As others have mentioned, Marcia's place is about a 10 min drive away from Waikiki, and there is a steep hill to climb up to get to the main house (nothing unmanageable or unbearable.) I got to briefly meet Marcia because a personal and emergency situation had come up,  so it was a bummer that I couldn't spend more time getting to know her after reading all the wonderful reviews. But she is a very lovely woman and knows her island.  A designated contact had taken care of my check-in, and he was very responsive and accessible. Overall, a wonderful stay and a great value. Hope to reconnect with Marcia again in the future! 

OH YEA -- Marcia introduced to me to a coffee shop near her house. I almost skipped this shop, but SO GLAD I decided to give it a chance on my last day! BEST ICED COFFEE EVER. Make sure you don't miss out!

Marcia made us feel very welcomed in her home.  We stayed for a week and enjoyed staying in the neighbourhood. Marcia’s home is in an excellent location, close to cafes, restaurants and the freeway.  It’s recommended to rent a car so that you can travel freely around the island.
Marcia is a wonderful host and very knowledgeable about the island. I had a great stay and would / will book with her again.

AMAZING!! the house is beautiful the view so pretty you will wanna wake up early just to look outside. place is spacious and every little detail makes you feel at home in Marcia's house. She is wonderful and helps so much with directions and all the little things you want to know about Hawaii. i enjoyed my stay beyond and just can not wait to come back. MAHALO marcia !!

My stay at Marcia place, located within Palolo Valley, was fantastic. The space was clean, stylish and comfortable. Just down the road are lots of local shops to explore. Marcia was very warm and welcoming and extremely knowledgeable about the island. Whether you're looking for good local coffee, restaurants or entertainment, Marcia can point you in the right direction. I would highly recommend staying here, especially if you want to experience a more local environment.

First of all' Marcia is a nice and authentic person. So you can feel really at home.  The home is really clean and più can enjoy also the common space inside and outsider. Great place to stay at Honolulu
Clean and private room with a view from the house. Marcia is a great host and will help you in anyway she can to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

Die Unterkunft von Marcia ist sehr gemütlich und sauber. Eich hatte ein schönes helles Zimmer viel Platz um meeine Sachen zu verstauen. Ich konnte die gesamte Einrichtung mitbenutzen und habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Auch ist die Ortschaft absolut empfehlenswert, sofern man ein Auto hat. Reise  mit ÖVs wäre möglich, aber man verliert zu viel Zeit. Marcia ist supernett und hilfsbereit. Ich war wirklich sehr zufrieden mit dem Aufenthalt.

This is the best stay at an Airbnb ever so far!
Marcia's place is super clean, modern and stylish. The room is big enough, you have enough space to put your own stuff. The bed is very comfortable, all the sheets smell so nice, you can sleep like a baby just like sleep at home.
The place is in a hill, if you have a car, would be perfect. But even if you cannot drive just like me, you still could take the bus to go anywhere easily, since the bus stop is just 3mins walk from the door.
Marcia is a super nice lady, she is beautiful, kind, active and intercultural. It's very nice to have conversations with this kind of international person! She is very helpful as well, can give you advice about where to go, what to do, also help you out when you need something, such like a beach towel and etc..
I very recommend to stay at Marcia's place when you visit Waikiki, you are gonna like the place and her! And I will stay again for sure when I visit next time!
Thanks Marcia, to have me! And looking forward to see you again somewhere in the future, please come to visit Tokyo!

Learn the #9 and 9S bus routes. I often walked to Waikiki, but those buses will get you there much faster. Actually, they're essential for making it back up the hill. The 9 will even get you one bus stop away from the airport.

Marcia’s home is absolutely beautiful. Marcia was SO helpful and it was absolutely lovely staying with her. She is extremely helpful with anything you might need and has such a lovely, warm spirit. I would absolutely recommend staying at her home and I cannot wait to come back.

Marcia's place is as perfect as it looks in the pictures. We had booked king size room and it was perfect for 2 people with enough storage. Nice fresh breeze inside the house, always feels fresh. She is a great host, loved chatting with her. Every night we discussed our day, shared experiences and planned for the next day. Marcia was a great help with exploring places. About the kitchen, Marcia provides all the kitchen utensils and storage boxes too, enough space in the refrigerator. Marcia has some beach stuff too which we used. Parking is available at the place which is a bit difficult because of the slope but you can easily find one on the street too.
nice home beautiful person

Marcia's home is simply wonderful. The location is so beautiful. Most mornings, I would walk on to the front deck with my breakfast and see a beautiful rainbow. The cool breeze from the lush green misty hills is a perfect way to start the day. Marcia keeps a clean home and is extremely hospitable. I immensely enjoyed the intellectual conversations over a glass of wine with her on several evenings. My next trip to O'ahu will be planned around the availability of Marcia's home.

Marcia,
very warm individual, with a welcoming space to share

Amazing host and house! Marcia is an extremely kind, respectful, spiritual person who makes you feel extremely welcome and embodies the Aloha spirit. Her personality is reflected in her home with amazing decor and maculate cleaniness. Hands down much better than any Airbnb I've stayed at in Honolulu for the same price

host.host_about: Carioca, adoro conhecer pessoas novas,  resido no mesmo prédio do apto que hospeda, em outro apartamento

name: Suíte privada
summary: Apartamento localizado há 20 minutos da estação de metrô Maracanã, próximo à UERJ, shopping e com farto transporte público para o centro e a zona sul.  Somos duas amigas que decidimos abrir nosso lar para abrigar visitantes na cidade maravilhosa, preferencialmente mulheres e não eleitores do Bozo. Também não somos do Rio e já nos sentimos muito perdidas por aqui. Desta forma, podemos te ajudar ao mesmo tempo em que vocês nos ajudam a pagar os boleto que, não tem jeito, chegam todo fim do mês.
space: Trata-se de uma suíte em que poderão contar com toda privacidade. Porém não há armários (mas tem bastante espaço para deixar as malas). Também disponibilizamos colchões, além da cama de casal. A sala e a cozinha está a disposição. Sem regras malucas, mas contando com o bom senso de todos, para a estadia ser a melhor possível :)

Also Cihangir is very cool, elegant and green area. In addition, flat is so close to Fındıklı Tramway Station and beach and from there you can start your istanbul trip.
transit: It is just five munites to Taksim metro station.
interaction: We will be glad to spend time together, show you around and give you tips about the city

host.host_about:
I and my  colleague Omer studied Business Administration  at the same university and we both worked for Deloitte for years as a financial auditor. After a professional career ,  we decided to do our own business which we love to do so that we can meet new people, cultures and places so thats why we are here. we have been to many countries and plannig to see the others as many as possible.
It will be a great pleasure to host you in our lovely city , Istanbul.

reviews.comments:
Great Experince.
The flat is located just 2-5 munites away from Taksim Square.
We spent great time in the terrace and very nice decorated living room. We have also all amenities in the flat. Very close to the flat there are markets and fruit seller. The host is very helpful. They gave us many tips and they are very prompt to answer if we have any questions.
Thanks for all this.
For sure we will come back.
Perfect location and friendly host , highly recommend!!

host.host_about: I live in this apartment with my parents since ever .I've also lived in San Diego, California -USA but just couldn't stay away from Rio de Janeiro for too long. I work as a Financial and Administrative Manager in a company that promotes health and wellfare (Website hidden by Airbnb) father is a pianist and my mother is a real estate agent. We always go to the beaches around us ( Copacabana, Ipanema, Arpoador and Leblon), We usually receive friends at home to play music ! We love cooking and eating out. We don't have car because we can easily walk everywhere and find everything very near us.

reviews.comments: Shirely is a wonderful host. Her apartment is located in section of Kowloon which is mainly composed of locals. There are many food options around with access to the buses, subway and taxis close by. The bathroom is quite small, but typical for Hong Kong.  As a host, Shirely is excellent; communicating regularly and always responsive. Next time I'm in HK, I will definitely try to reserve with Shirely.

name: The Main St-Laurent by Liv MTL - 307
summary: This has it all! Two bedrooms, modern and sun-filled apartment, located in the heart of the ultra cool Plateau Mont-Royal, on a pedestrian street near the best restaurants, tourist attractions, bars and shops. Metro is a stroll  away! Impressively high ceilings, floor to ceiling windows. One can hardly find a better spot in town!!! It's ideal for anyone wanting to experience Montreal's unique culture!
space: Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi. The kitchen is well equipped with a fridge, microwave, oven range, coffee maker, tea kettle, toaster, and is stocked with all the cook & glassware you will need. neighborhood_overview: Located on one of the most charming pedestrian streets near several restaurants, bars and shops, you are 15 minutes walk from the Place des Arts and 10 minutes from the Mont-Royal avenue. A beautiful green area, Mont-Royal Park, 5 minutes walk from the apartment to go for picnik near the lake or for winter skating. Public parking is available just behind the building and the metro station is 8 minutes walk. This is the real-deal Montreal. The Plateau's arterial St-Laurent boulevard and St-Denis  street, are just around the corner. Up and down the stretch you'll find a variety of places to eat, drink, and be entertained. This apartment is in the section of the Plateau warmly referred as the hart of the PLATEAU with all the  ICONIC RESTAURANTS: Beauties,  L'Avenue, Swartz, Willinsky, L'Express , Romados, St-Viateur Bagel, Fairmont Bagel, Cafe Rico ,Cafe Olympico and many more. Activities: Many parks and green spaces around, which makes it a great neighbourhood for families! Tennis courts
transit: Lots of great spots to explore in walking distance, including Mount Royal Park. The nearest metro station is a 8 minute walk away and will get you Old Montreal and Downtown in about 10 minutes.  PARKING.  There are few options for parking: On street paid parking for 3$/hour or a private lot  a block away for 12$/day with in and out priviledges.  Even some free spots on crossing streets depending on dates & time, please read & respect the city signs.  PARKING LOT 12$/night, in & out privileges.  Please note: the parking attendant isn’t always there!!! Look for little notes he puts in the window of the cabin. Please share this info with all your guests!  With our best regards, Liv MTL ❤️ Superhost!
access: The guest has access to the entire apartment.
interaction: No keys needed for your check in and check out! We are equipped with smart digital locks. The property manager will greet you upon arrival to walk you through the space and answer any questions you my have, to make your stay more enjoyable. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need any kind of help or advice. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.

name: Family Apartment with Balcony in Gracia - 1821
summary: Lugares de interés: Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, Gràcia. Te va a encantar este apartamento debido a el espacio acogedor, la ubicación, y nuetsro personal. El alojamiento es ideal para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos). Edad mínima para hacer el check-in: 25 años.
space: En un edificio tranquilo con ascensor, este recién renovado apartamento de 2 dormitorios dispone de un balcón privado con vistas espectaculares a la ciudad.   El dormitorio principal está equipado con una cama de matrimonio; y el segundo dormitorio tiene cama nido, perfecto para una persona o dos. El cuarto de baño está equipado con un plato de ducha para mayor comodidad. El luminoso salón-comedor incluye una cocina americana muy bien equipada y muy práctica además de un sofá cama individual.  También incluye Wi-Fi, TV, aire acondicionado  y electrodomésticos modernos. Siéntete como en casa con tu propio dormitorio, salón, cocina y baño.    La verdadera joya de la corona de este apartamento es el balcón de 15m2, equipada con una mesa de comedor, toldo eléctrico, suelo de madera con unas vistas espectaculares a Barcelona.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is marked by the proximity of the market of Bolhão, the most typical place of Porto, where you can find the real Oporto and its customs. The street has a large variety of traditional and historical shops in Porto. In addition to the Bolhão market, the "Casa Chinesa" with Portuguese specialties, "Casa Natal", the famous "confeitaria Imprério", and the space of great reference of the traditional Pastel de Nata of "A Manteigaria". There are several patisseries and cafés on the street where breakfast and other meals are served. Speaking of gastronomy, the offer is very varied: "O Buraco" restaurant,  confectionery / restaurant "A Cunha",  "A Taberna do Doutor",  all typical places of Porto. Theexclusive  restaurant and rooftop bar of Hotel D. Henrique has one of the best views over the Port;  "Bull BBGourmet Bolhão";  "Champanheria da Baixa", among others. The area is very well served by supermarkets and convenience stores:  Pingo Doce at 150m, Froiz at 400m and many more
notes: - Turn off the lights before leaving the apartment. The world is grateful! - Make conscious use of water and avoid waste. The world is grateful! - Respect the hours of silence, avoiding noise after 10pm. - Respect the common areas of the building, avoiding noise. - On balconies smoking is not a problem, but avoid smoke adding hard-to-eliminate smells from the apartment. - Put garbage in the public container daily to avoid unpleasant odors in the apartment. - Before you check out, make sure the entrance doors to the building are unlocked. - If you notice any abnormality in the apartment, let us know immediately. - Enjoy tremendously our city, Oporto! Thank you for being a perfect guest!
transit: On the metro, from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, take line E and exit at Bolhão station (towards Estádio do Dragão). After leaving, you have to walk 200 meters (3 minutes) to the apartment. The apartment is well served by public transport allowing quick connections with all points of the city of Porto. A few meters from the apartment there are several public parking parks in addition to parking along the street.
access: All areas of the apartment are available for guests with complete privacy.
interaction: The Porto City Hosts team is always available to assist and help you have a lovely stay.
house_rules: We would like to inform our guests that we can provide: - Breakfast in the apartment for an additional cost of  8€ - Transfer from/ to the Airport by 25€ (up to 4 people) or 45€ (up to 8 people) - City Tours  - Douro Valley Tours  Property Rules: -Every guest is required to provide a valid credit card number, expiration date and cvc number at the time the reservation is requested. The credit card will be used to guarantee payment for any incidentals or charges not previewed in the reservation -You can drop your luggage at our downtown office, next to Aliados metro station from 9am to 6pm, subject to prior information. -Towels and sheets are included for your stay. The change of towels and sheets is free for bookings of more than 8 per day. -Extra cleaning is available upon prior request, at the rate of cleaning fee. -Toilet amenities will be provided for the first 3 days of the stay. -Extra towels are available on request for an extra fee of 3€ per set of towels per person. -Please als

host.host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a tourism team. We receive our guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!

We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto. You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto.
