reviews.comments:
Crystal was extremely helpful, met us at the apartment when we arrived, and helped us with travel and information about Hong Kong. Our 8-month old had a great time, and Crystal was always a phone call away for anything that we needed. She even offered to arrange for transportation back to the airport when we left.

The location was great, and the room, while small, was clean, well-cared for, and less than a 5 minute walk from Times Square. Highly recommended!

A VERY GOOD LOCATION FOR EVERYTHING....D ROOM WAS CLEANS ENOUGH TO STAY.AND FOR CRYSTAL SHE WAS REALLY HELPFUL. BUT AS U KNOW U REALLY DON READ THE TERMS AND CONDITON CAREFULLY RITE..??? THIS BUDGET ROOM WAS GOOD TO STAY BUT THE ONLY THING I DON REALLY AGREE IS, SHE CHARGE ME FOR ELECTRICAL BILL... !!! EVERYTIME WE GO OUT WE TURN OFF EVERYTHING BUT IN THE END I STILL HAVE TO PAY...
SO IF U WISH TO STAY AT HERE PLS NEGOTIATE BEFORE U RENT..

First of all, when we entered the room we noticed that the bed was not made up. It was like someone just slept in it. The bed was very high. My busband, average height for a Chinese, had to climb up.The boy who came with you was sweeping the floor. (what does that tell you?)  Shouldn't cleanliness be done before admitting a tenant? You even threw your shopping bag under the hangers where the clothes were hung.There was only one chair for two people. The tile floor was slippery so was the bathroom floor which was cement. I had to walk gingerly holding on to something for fear of falling. Your shampoo and soap bottles were on the floor. There was no place, a shelf or a ledge, to hold toiletries. When I opened the medicine cabinet to look for shelves and I found them so dirty I had to put toilet paper to line them. I don't think the place was cleaned after the last tenants whom you rented to for a much lower rent, $200 for 3 nights. You left the debris because you did not clean the room. I doubt if you even cleaned the bed sheets and pillow cases for us. Am I not telling all the facts? When you met us you mean you did not know that we are elderly people? The place did not look like what your pictures look at all. Now how can I put all that in my review for the public? The one good point for your place is the location, very convenient. I hope you will fix up your place, rearrange your furniture and cover your bathroom floor before an accident happens. Good luck.

his place is at one of the best location in HK. Very central and convenient to move everywhere efficiently.
The room are well thought, bright and very calm for HK standards. There is Wi-Fi all ready and a double layered glass that protect you from the heat and the noise of the streets. Bathroom and bed are spacious and comfortable.
Also both Crystal the owner and Judy the helper are very nice and helpful.

This is my first time booking through AirBnB, and I had such a pleasant experience staying at Crystal's that I can't believe it's taken me this long to do this!   

Both Crystal and Judy (the housekeeper) are very friendly and only a phone call away if you need anything.  Since the building has a few steps before the elevator, they'll be sure to help you lug your luggage too.  Very helpful for a single female traveler like myself.  

The place is located right on a major road with a ton of transportation options to go anywhere in HK.  It's right in between Causeway and Wanchai (5-10 min walk towards each), which is perfect for shopping and great food, yet far away so you're not in the middle of the chaos all the time.

The common area is kept up well, Judy comes every other day to clean I believe.  The other housemates are also respectful of the common area so you won't see any clutter around.  The room itself is spacious for HK standards and has all the basic amenities that you'd need for a single traveler.  Crystal is very accommodating and would try to provide you with what you need if you ask!  Before I moved in, I noticed that there isn't a mirror in the room (other than the bathroom one), and they were able to get me a mirror :)

My only gripe about the place is that the Internet can be slow at times because the room is situated farthest from the router.  A usual traveler probably would not notice, but I had to do quite a bit of work during my stay.  

Overall, I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!

**edit: Crystal reached out to me afterwards to let me know that there is LAN connection available which would have much faster connection.  This just goes to show how much she cares about her guests that she would respond to me even after the stay :)

This was a great stay! I had everything I needed and if not the host was very helpful and would get me what I needed if possible. I was even provided a sim car which was great for maps! The description and photos were accurate. Lots of benefits with the place
CS Lee was very easy to communicate with. She was responsive and helpful throughout my stay.

This was a great first experience on airbnb. She met me at the place and was so kind and efficient. Everything worked really well - good equipment, nice space and all. So convenient for buses and MTR and being next to the market was delightful.
Highly recommended.

Highly recommend staying here! Great location, the apartment was clean and had everything you'd need to have a comfortable stay. Crystal was also a great host. She was very helpful and easy to contact.

The apartment gives you a sense of what it'd feel like staying on a typical Hong Kong apartment, which adds to the experience.

We'll definitely be looking forward to staying here again on our next trip!!

I have stayed there for 3 months. The place is really great : huge bathroom, 2 tables, lots of hangers, efficient internet wifi and everything was provided. Clean, cozy and bright place. Common area  (kitchen and washing machine) is kept clean. You won't regret it. Perfect for both short and long stay.
The location is good, between wanchai and causeway bay subway station. Market and laundry the next street, close to timesquare and lots of good restaurants all around. The host is really helpful and is extremely quick to answer. Really good deal.

I had been sent on a business trip from the States for about 2 months and I was given flexibility to choose my own accommodations.  I came across the room in the apartment on airbnb and decided to try it out.  Crystal had her assistant Anna help me move in.  The place is in a fairly convenient location on the border between Causeway Bay and Wanchai, with the closest MTR station being the time square entry/exit, about a 10 minute walk.

The room in the apartment is plenty sufficient for just one person.  I was working so I didn't spend too much time in the apartment.  The bed was plenty big and comfortable.  The internet connection was mostly stable.  The TV had a lot of channels to keep you entertained.  Maybe one slight issue on the apartment is the shower/bathroom setup, where there is not separation between the shower and the toilet, so after showering the whole areas take sometime to dry.  It wasn't much of an issue for me since I was mostly out during the day.  The apartment was very well secured, with multiple doors that require key/keycard.  Don't forget the keys, it could be very inconvenient.  You have to contact Crystal and she would promptly let you back in.

Crystal is a very responsible host, she responded to every request I had, from additional supplies to space heater.  All the items Crystal listed was provided, including simcards and gym membership (monthly renters). She generally responds very promptly.  I recommend this place to stay if you are alone or at most 2 ppl for each room.

Very easy to communicate and organise - instant reply to any email and always answers her phone. Pictures are totally accurate of the room. Ideal if you are eating out every night and so perfect over the 'sevens' as you are in walking distance

Crystal was a really friendly host that made me feel very welcome. Her place is nice and spacious which is a nice suprise when you step off the busy Wang Chai road! The noise level is really low so you can get a good night's sleep.

The apartment is really clean and quite spacious and the patio outdoor area is really nice and relaxing.

I'd definately use one of Crystal's apartments again the next time I come to Hong Kong.

Crystal was very helpful.  I made a last minute booking and was accommodated instantly.  The room was very clean and smells good.  Our flight was delayed but she managed to arrange for Anna to pick us up.  Anna was very helpful as well.  I will be visiting Hong Kong again and will surely coordinate with Crystal once more.

reviews.comments: The listing on the description was accurate and as advertised.  We were looking for a place close to Olympic Park and we were within walking distance.  The apartment was clean and had all amenities listed.  The downside was that there was not much in the area as far as restaurants and nightlife.  a small grocery store next door and a pharmacy for basic needs.  Getting from the airport was trying since little is translated to English and I found transportation tough to navigate.  A lot of volume at the airport that Rio just didn't know what to do with due to the Olympics.  Fabio did work to connect me with local services and did provide a nice welcoming at the apartment.  This was very convenient for the Olympics but the open swear system and lack of nightlife would lead me to look else where if I ever return to Rio.

O apartamento é novo, o condomínio é bom e fica numa boa localização! O local é seguro, tem delicatessen e umas lojinhas próximas! Fui muito bem recebida por Fabio e sua família, que se preocupou em todo momento em me dar assistência, se necessário! Obrigada pela hospitalidade!

Estão procurando uma hospedagem no Rio? Esse ap é tudo de bom, receptividade, localização, conforto e colocação. O anfitrião cuidou de tudo até mimos recebemos e não passei por nenhum problema. Deu ótimas dicas de turismo e uso dos objetos. Super indico.❤✌

neighborhood_overview: ❤ Right at the center of Mong Kok town and in Nathan Road ❤ Ladies market, Temple Street, famous shopping streets etc. are all within walkable distance ❤ Exploring either Hong Kong island or Kowloon is pretty easy, thanks to the MTR nearby (1 min by walk) and many number of bus stops around ❤ Close to Mong Kok night life and shopping streets ❤ Langham place shopping mall is right behind ❤ Plenty of food choices around ❤ Rather than taking MTR, I would strongly suggest you to walk from Mong Kok until Tsim Sha Tsui to get the feel of real Hong Kong !! You will never regret! ❤ Disneyland, Ocean park etc. are within 30 minutes distance!
notes: ❤ Late checkout / early check-in : subject to the availability, I can definitely assist you on it. But this is something I can confirm only one day before your arrival / departure. Also, please note that early check in is only to drop your suitcases. Cleaning will happen only according to the cleaner’s schedule ❤ Baggage storage:  If your flight is late after check out, you can go to Hong Kong Metro Station or Kowloon Metro station to leave your suitcases, they have special service. You can refer to the Housing Manual kept in the apartment for more details.  ❤ Housing Manual also have some place you must see in Hong Kong. They are my favorite places. ❤ Self check-in is very easy. You will receive entire direction details after your booking. ❤ You can reach at the property anytime. There are transportation options 24x7. I will send you details after the booking is confirmed.
transit: ❤The easiest public transportation is MTR / Subway. Nearest subway station is just 200-300 meters away ❤ There are many bus stops just infront of the building. The buses / minibuses service is available 24x7 ❤ Getting a taxi is extremely easy. Taxi stand is just downstairs ❤ If you are coming from China, nearest stop is Mong Kok East station. It is walkable from the station to my property ❤ Macau Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes by taxi / bus ❤ To / from airport : Day time, use bus A21 (35 minutes, 37 HKD). At night time, use NA21
access: ❤ My sweet apartment is a private apartment, it's only for you.  ❤ You will be alone in the apartment, with private bathroom and private toilet. You don’t need to share any such amenities with any stranger. **Better than hotel and cheaper**
interaction: ❤ Once the booking is done, you will receive detailed instructions and a useful video for the check-in process. If any concerns, I am always available on Whatsap / We-Chat / Airbnb chat. ❤ I will be more than happy to give you recommendations for the places to visit and local restaurants. ❤ You can enjoy the airbnb superhost experience with me :-) All my apartments are 5* rated by previous guests. 90% of the reviews are really positive. ❤ Self check-in. Everything is automated. But if you struggle, just give me a call, I will be there to help you

The main attraction is the location. It is right at Nathan road and in front of MTR. The bus from airport drops u just in front of the building, which really great! Many eateries, shopping options and pubs nearby. Overall, a great experience. Recommending strongly.

neighborhood_overview: Causeway Bay is one of Hong Kong's major shopping and tourism districts. It includes Japanese department store Sogo, Times Square, and Hysan Place. Causeway Bay is one of the most crowded and central areas in Hong Kong. The area contains many trendy shops carrying both locally made and imported fashion and products from around the world. As such, it is a popular social spot for young people. Many shops are open until after midnight.
transit: For the MTR, it is connected by the Island Line: Tin Hau and Causeway Bay stations. Both Tram and bus services provides connections along Causeway Bay as a first and last mile connection.

Excelente !! Tudo Perfeito !!! Recomendo muito !!!

O apartamento estava limpo, arrumado, e fica bem localizado, fácil acesso a transporte público, mercado, farmácia, banco, (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza uma boa opção pra ficar na Barra!

Nossa estadia no apartamento do Bruno foi ótima, por ser um apartamento prático, com tudo o que se precisa para passar uns dias fora de casa.
Está muito bem localizado, junto a farmácia, supermercados, shopping centers, a 3 minutos da estação do BRT e próximo dos principais eventos das Olimpíadas Rio 2016.
Oferece uma bela vista, é bem ventilado, bem iluminado e bem limpo, o que eu considero um fator bastante importante. 
Internet e TV funcionam muito bem, a cama é bem confortável e o guarda-roupas está livre e com cabides.
O Bruno esteve muito atento às nossas necessidades e nos passou todas as informações antes mesmo de chegarmos ao Rio, o que facilitou bastante os nossos dias.
Meu marido e eu gostamos e sem dúvidas ficaríamos lá novamente.

The apartment is just as described - the bed was fabulous!  The host was really responsive unfortunately we did have some issues getting into the apartment and the door alarm going off several times.  However, Bruno did fix these things straight away.  It would have been helpful to know you go down the side street prior to the address to gain access to the building.  It was perfect for us as we were attending the Olympics and even managed a walk to the beach not far away.
Thanks very much Bruno
Muito obrigado por tudo bruno! a champagne na próxima vez eu tomo! muito boa a localização!

O Bruno foi muito atencioso, e esteve disponível quando precisei falar com ele.

Voltaria para o espaço do Bruno sem pensar duas vezes!

name: Perfect Location! Suite Room 1 min from La Rambla
summary: Beautiful Suite Room with a  full private and spacious bathroom and a cute balcony, in a nice modern apartment. The room has a comfortable double bed, a full bathroom and an office desk, perfectly suited for a nice vacation or a work trip. Central AC and heating system. The location couldn't be any better, in the heart of the city center, just 100 meters from La Rambla, 10 minute walk away from Pl Catalunya, Barcelona's main square and 20 minutes walking to the famous Barceloneta Beach.
